subject: RE: [junit] VA Java import
msgSnippet: That seems reasonable. One thing - there s already a document on www.junit.org on using JUnit under VA Java. Given the availability of a repository-based
messageBody:
That seems reasonable. One thing - there's already a document on
www.junit.org on using JUnit under VA Java. Given the availability of a
repository-based import for 3.7, this document should be updated to point to
the new download, as well as new instructions. Is there a process for
submitting changes to junit.org?

Also, I noticed that many of the files in
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/ are not listed at junit.org. It
seems like they should be included. My concern is that things go into
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/ but nobody notices them unless
they closely follow this forum or the download area, which doesn't seem to
be mentioned in junit.org.

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein
SilverMark, Inc.
The object testing company
http://www.silvermark.com
